  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Project Manager",
  "description": "Zumera is on an Extraordinary journey of inspiring a better future by building Innovative, Sustainable and the High Standard Infrastructural Development. We aspire to see our communities strive, our People Empowered and a Continent realizing its Full Potential.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Benin City, Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and experienced Project Manager to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.
	This role requires excellent organizational skills, strong leadership abilities, and the capacity to manage multiple projects simultaneously.


Job Description


	Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, resources, and budgets.
	Coordinate and lead project team members to ensure all aspects of the project are completed on schedule.
	Monitor project progress and make adjustments as necessary to ensure the successful completion of projects.
	Establish and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including team members, clients, and upper management.
	Communicate project expectations to team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion.
	Identify and manage project risks and develop mitigation strategies.
	Determine and manage project resource requirements, including personnel, equipment, and materials.
	Develop and manage project budgets, estimating time and costs.
	Ensure that all projects are delivered with high quality and meet or exceed stakeholder expectations.
	Implement and manage project quality control systems
	Proactively manage changes in project scope, schedule, and costs using appropriate verification techniques.
	Lead and motivate project team members throughout the project lifecycle.
	Facilitate problem-solving and collaboration among team members.
	Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation, plans, and reports.
	Provide regular updates to upper management and key stakeholders on project status, issues, and risks.
	Conduct project post-mortems and create recommendations for improvement.
	Stay up-to-date with project management best practices and emerging trends.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
	Proven experience as a Project Manager, with a track record of successfully delivered projects.
	Strong knowledge of project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Waterfall).
	Proficiency in project management software tools (e.g., Microsoft Project, Jira, Trello).
	Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
	Strong leadership and team management abilities.
	PMP or PRINCE2 certification is preferred.
	Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent time management and organizational skills.
	Adaptability and flexibility to changing project requirements.
	Strong negotiation and conflict resolution skills
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
	On-time and within-budget project delivery
	Stakeholder satisfaction ratings
	Team performance and productivity
	Quality of project deliverables
	Effective risk management and issue resolution
	Accuracy of project planning and estimation


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV&nbsp;and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;vanessangozi@zumeraproperty.com&nbsp;using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

Front Desk Representative Job at Polymath Real Estate Limited




        
    

        
        Polymath Real Estate Limited is a reputable development company that is committed to making real estate transactions stress-free and straightforward. We distinguish ourselves as the brand that genuinely cares about our clients' satisfaction and their overall experience.

Our team of experts takes pride in their ability to solve real estate-related problems, such as getting good properties, having proper documentation and titles, and ensuring that properties can be passed on to future generations smoothly. Our clients' happiness and satisfaction have been our top priority for over a year, and we are always looking for ways to exceed their expectations
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Representative
Job Location: Ibeju Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job brief


	We are looking for a pleasant Front Desk Representative to undertake all receptionist and clerical duties at the desk of our main entrance.
	You will be the “face” of the company for all visitors and will be responsible for the first impression we make.
	The ideal candidate will have a friendly and easy-going personality while also being very perceptive and disciplined.
	You should be able to deal with complaints and give accurate information. A customer-oriented approach is essential.
	The goal is to make guests and visitors feel comfortable and valued while on our premises.


Responsibilities


	Keep the front desk tidy and presentable with all necessary materials (pens, forms, paper etc.)
	Greet and welcome the guest
	Answer questions and address complaints
	Answer all incoming calls and redirect them or keep messages
	Receiveletters, packages etc., and distribute them
	Prepare outgoing mail by drafting correspondence, securing parcels etc.
	Keep updated records and files
	Monitor office expenses and costs
	Check, sort, and forward emails
	Understand social media handling
	Monitor office supplies and place orders when necessary
	Take up other duties as assigned (travel arrangements, schedules etc.).


Requirements and Skills


	Proven experience as a front desk representative, agent or relevant position
	Familiarity with office machines (e.g., fax, printer etc.)
	Knowledge of office management and basic bookkeeping
	Proficient in English (oral and written)
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel and Word)
	Strong communication and people skills
	Good organizational and multi-tasking abilities
	Problem-solving skills
	Customer service orientation
	High School diploma; additional qualifications will be a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@polymathrealestate.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Recruitment Specialist Job at U Connect Human Resources Limited
content:
U Connect Human Resources Limited is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Recruitment Specialist

Job Location: Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Sourcing and Screening:
     

            
    




	Developing recruitment strategies: Creating and implementing plans to attract a diverse pool of qualified candidates.
	Posting job openings: Advertising positions on various platforms like job boards, social media, and company websites.
	Reviewing resumes and applications: Filtering through a large volume of submissions to identify candidates who meet the basic requirements.
	Conducting initial screenings: Performing phone screens or brief interviews to assess a candidate's qualifications and interest.


Interviewing and Selection:


	Coordinating interviews: Scheduling interviews with hiring managers and other relevant stakeholders.
	Conducting interviews: Leading both in-person and virtual interviews to evaluate candidates' skills, experience, and cultural fit.
	Assessing candidate qualifications: Using various methods like behavioral questions, technical assessments, and case studies to evaluate candidates.
	Making hiring recommendations: Providing feedback and recommendations to hiring managers on which candidates to move forward with.


Managing the Recruitment Process:


	Managing candidate communication: Keeping candidates informed throughout the recruitment process.
	Collaborating with hiring managers: Working closely with hiring managers to understand their needs and ensure a smooth recruitment process.
	Negotiating job offers: Communicating with selected candidates to negotiate salary and benefits.
	Managing the onboarding process: Coordinating with HR and other departments to ensure a smooth transition for new hire.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc with 3 - 5 years of work experience.


Salary
N350,000 - N400,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: uconnecthr@u-connect-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
